data.name: MuyComputer, MuySeguridad Dark
data.description: A dark style for muycomputer and muyseguridad

data.name: PQ Musescore Night Theme
data.description:
Makes Musescore dark.
Also uses invert filter to make sheet music black and uses custom scrollbars.

user.name: pixelqiwi
user.about:
I am a self proclaimed web-designer with a passion to make every site more comfortable for me to use. I also have my own website that I have made from scratch, with my own hands. No Bootstrap, no templates, only me, my text editor and my trusty CSS textbook. 

My styles are all Public Domain because it's not like I own the CSS of the website anyway. Feel free to throw some pennies my way though, that's always appreciated!

data.css:
/* not sure, but this one should work better*/

@-moz-document domain("musescore.com") {
/* redoing everything from nothing */
body::-webkit-scrollbar,
._2I8aD::-webkit-scrollbar,
fJ6Th::-webkit-scrollbar
{
    width: 12px !important;
}
body::-webkit-scrollbar-track,
._2I8aD::-webkit-scrollbar-track,
fJ6Th::-webkit-scrollbar-track
{
    background-color: #222 !important;
}
body::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,
._2I8aD::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,
fJ6Th::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb
{
    background-color: #666 !important;
}

body
{
    background: #111
}

._1Wj8N,
.rWbJE,

select,

.bootstrap-select > .dropdown-toggle,
.dropdown-menu,
.H0jZI,
._3W2jx:nth-child(2n)
{
    background: #181818;
    border: none;
    color: #eee;
}

table._28ocq tr._5OkFV,
._1KO_p,
._2_zNz,
._2_w4F,
.BHmc6,
._1G7XT,

._1G7XT:focus,
._35B2J.eamGu ._YV7B,
._3DKUF,
._2mtqY,
._3j9CK._3A7i9,
._2lTa1,
.fJ6Th,
.H0jZI._3REaJ,
._3RQ7R,
._6o1s0,
.header,
.max-upload,
.beat-item .score-manager .views-exposed-form a.group,
.beat-item .score-manager .views-form a.group,
.follow .score-manager .views-exposed-form .flag,
.follow .score-manager .views-form .flag,
.gift .score-manager .views-exposed-form .flag,
.gift .score-manager .views-form .flag,
.score-manager .views-exposed-form .beat-item a.group,
.score-manager .views-exposed-form .button,
.score-manager .views-exposed-form .follow .flag,
.score-manager .views-exposed-form .gift .flag,
.score-manager .views-exposed-form button,
.score-manager .views-exposed-form input.form-text,
.score-manager .views-exposed-form select,
.score-manager .views-form .beat-item a.group,
.score-manager .views-form .button,

.score-manager .views-form .gift .flag,
.score-manager .views-form button,
.score-manager .views-form input.form-text,
.score-manager .views-form select,
._1yNfa
{
    background: #111;
    border: none;
    color: #eee;
}

._2EX1C,
._3HKzi,
._2mCkl td,
._2mCkl th,
._2OGD_,
._31gzi.ucYwV,
.xTH2u,
.chats-empty__subtitle,
.chats-empty__title,
.chats-empty__desc,
h1,
.page-header-description,

.article-votes,

._3R0py

._28ocq,

._2DMNv,
._11uHB.uhPsB + ._11uHB,
.CffkH,

._3Lgvm,
._2Dl0a,
.container-divider,
.article-votes,
.article-relatives,
.score-manager thead
{
    border: none
}

._2pFQ6:nth-child(even)
{
    background: #222;
    border: none;
    padding: 12px
}
._2pFQ6:nth-child(odd)
{
    background: #282828;
    border: none;
    padding: 12px
}

._3HKzi a,
._1VNhV,
.hoyVd,
.breadcrumbs li a:visited,
a:-webkit-any-link
{
    color: #0099ff
}

._2jwGg,
._3928m._2jTcG ._2_zNz,
.-uVbE
{
    background-color: #09f
}

.-uVbE:hover
{
    background-color: #4af
}


._2Ifc-._8pMIq path
{
    fill: #eee
}

._15kzJ._2uj9v._1Us9e:hover
{
    color: #09f
}

.gXB83,
.SA76l img
{
    filter: invert(0.9) hue-rotate(180deg)
}

.score-manager .views-exposed-form input[type="submit"]
{
    background: #111 url(https://musescore.com/static/public/img/musescore/search.svg) no-repeat 50%;
    background-size: 18px auto;
}

._1qu2I._1gkKD
{
    background: transparent
}
}

data.name: Remove Ad Banner - YouTube
data.description: Removes the ad banner that appears on the bottom of videos.

data.name: MangaHost Deluxe 2020
data.description:
Versão do MangaHost com um visual moderno, limpo e sem anúncios.

Quais as vantagens?
• Sem anúncios
• Sistema de cores do Material Design
• Nova fonte (Segoe UI)
• Alinhamento correto dos elementos
• Mais em breve!

data.name: Amazon - Minimal Dark
data.description: A dark, minimalist take on Amazon.com. Created primarily for my own use, however if someone makes a recommendation or suggestion that I like, I may implement it.

data.name: VT Basecamp 3 | v1.0
data.description: A modernized and better user experience Basecamp, based on http://visualtea.com/ flavor. Some improvements include: sticky breadcrumbs, attachments links changed to buttons, wider content width, and much more.

Inspired by ExtremeGammon 2D board theme.

data.name: Wide GitLab
data.description: Userstyle for making all of GitLab completely fluid. Style by https://github.com/peshrus Post all issues at https://github.com/peshrus/gitlab-wide/issues
